TABLE.NAME: adastra
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the adastra activity module instances.

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the activity module instance

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was added to the course.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the intro field.

TABLE.NAME: adastra_course_settings
TABLE.COMMENT: Course-wide settings concerning Ad Astra exercises

FIELD.NAME: apikey
FIELD.COMMENT: Secret API key needed to authorize the use of the HTTP course API in the exercise service server.

FIELD.NAME: configurl
FIELD.COMMENT: Configuration URL from which the course exercises configuration is downloaded for automatic setup.

FIELD.NAME: sectionnum
FIELD.COMMENT: Moodle course section number (0-N) which new activities are added to.

FIELD.NAME: contentnumbering
FIELD.COMMENT: Numbering style for exercises (content under rounds).

FIELD.NAME: lang
FIELD.COMMENT: Language of the course defined by the backend. Example single value: en, multiple values: |en|fi|.
